title: Conjurations
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Conjurations** indicates a character's skill at controlling damage-dealing spells of various types. While some spells are pure Conjurations (e.g. [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart")), most damage-dealing spells combine this skill with an elemental school or other skill (e.g. [Stone Arrow](/Stone_Arrow "Stone Arrow"), [Hailstorm](/Hailstorm "Hailstorm")).

## Contents

- [1 Aptitudes](#Aptitudes)

- [2 Spells](#Spells)

  - [2.8 Level 8](#Level_8)
  - [2.9 Level 9](#Level_9)

- [4 See Also](#See_Also)

- [5 History](#History)

## Sources

- Main Texts

  - **[Book of Annihilations](/Book_of_Annihilations "Book of Annihilations")**: [Chain Lightning](/Chain_Lightning "Chain Lightning"), [Fire Storm](/Fire_Storm "Fire Storm")
  - **[Book of Conjurations](/Book_of_Conjurations "Book of Conjurations")**: [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart"), [Searing Ray](/Searing_Ray "Searing Ray"), [Fulminant Prism](/Fulminant_Prism "Fulminant Prism")
  - **[Book of Dangerous Friends](/Book_of_Dangerous_Friends "Book of Dangerous Friends")**: [Orb of Destruction](/Orb_of_Destruction "Orb of Destruction"), [Spellforged Servitor](/Spellforged_Servitor "Spellforged Servitor")
  - **[Book of Power](/Book_of_Power "Book of Power")**: [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere"), [Bombard](/Bombard "Bombard"), [Spellforged Servitor](/Spellforged_Servitor "Spellforged Servitor")
  - **[Book of Spectacle](/Book_of_Spectacle "Book of Spectacle")**: [Dazzling Flash](/Dazzling_Flash "Dazzling Flash"), [Starburst](/Starburst "Starburst")
  - **[Book of the Spheres](/Book_of_the_Spheres "Book of the Spheres")**: [Brom's Barrelling Boulder](/Brom%27s_Barrelling_Boulder "Brom's Barrelling Boulder"), [Iskenderun's Battlesphere](/Iskenderun%27s_Battlesphere "Iskenderun's Battlesphere"), [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), [Conjure Ball Lightning](/Conjure_Ball_Lightning "Conjure Ball Lightning"), [Orb of Destruction](/Orb_of_Destruction "Orb of Destruction")

- Other Texts

  - **[Book of Air](/Book_of_Air "Book of Air")**: [Shock](/Shock "Shock")
  - **[Book of Armaments](/Book_of_Armaments "Book of Armaments")**: [Stone Arrow](/Stone_Arrow "Stone Arrow"), [Lehudib's Crystal Spear](/Lehudib%27s_Crystal_Spear "Lehudib's Crystal Spear")
  - **[Book of Blasting](/Book_of_Blasting "Book of Blasting")**: [Fulminant Prism](/Fulminant_Prism "Fulminant Prism"), [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast")
  - **[Book of Cantrips](/Book_of_Cantrips "Book of Cantrips")**: [Sting](/Sting "Sting")
  - **[Book of Chaos](/Book_of_Chaos "Book of Chaos")**: [Conjure Ball Lightning](/Conjure_Ball_Lightning "Conjure Ball Lightning")
  - **[Book of the Dragon](/Book_of_the_Dragon "Book of the Dragon")**: [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball")
  - **[Book of the Earth](/Book_of_the_Earth "Book of the Earth")**: [Bombard](/Bombard "Bombard")
  - **[Book of Fire](/Book_of_Fire "Book of Fire")**: [Foxfire](/Foxfire "Foxfire"), [Starburst](/Starburst "Starburst")
  - **[Book of Flames](/Book_of_Flames "Book of Flames")**: [Flame Wave](/Flame_Wave "Flame Wave")
  - **[Book of Frost](/Book_of_Frost "Book of Frost")**: [Hailstorm](/Hailstorm "Hailstorm")
  - **[Book of Geomancy](/Book_of_Geomancy "Book of Geomancy")**: [Stone Arrow](/Stone_Arrow "Stone Arrow"), [Brom's Barrelling Boulder](/Brom%27s_Barrelling_Boulder "Brom's Barrelling Boulder")
  - **[Book of Lightning](/Book_of_Lightning "Book of Lightning")**: [Arcjolt](/Arcjolt "Arcjolt")

## See Also

- [Conjurer](/Conjurer "Conjurer")

## History

- [0.28](/0.28 "0.28") Added [Flame Wave](/Flame_Wave "Flame Wave"). [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma") is now only for monsters.
- [0.25](/0.25 "0.25") Removed many Conjurations from player spell lists: [Flame Tongue](/Flame_Tongue "Flame Tongue"), [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame"), [Throw Frost](/Throw_Frost "Throw Frost"), [Dazzling Spray](/Dazzling_Spray "Dazzling Spray"), [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance"), [Throw Icicle](/Throw_Icicle "Throw Icicle"), [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining"), [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt"), [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire"), [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold"), [Poison Arrow](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow"), and [Glaciate](/Glaciate "Glaciate"). Also added several new spells: [Foxfire](/Foxfire "Foxfire"), [Dazzling Flash](/Dazzling_Flash "Dazzling Flash"), [Hailstorm](/Hailstorm "Hailstorm"), and [Starburst](/Starburst "Starburst").
- [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") Introduced [Glaciate](/Glaciate "Glaciate") to replace [Ice Storm](/Ice_Storm "Ice Storm").
- [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") Introduced [Searing Ray](/Searing_Ray "Searing Ray") and boosted [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance") from level 2 to level 5 with a corresponding increase in power.
- [0.12](/0.12 "0.12") Introduced several new, non-elemental Conjurations.

html:
Conjurations

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

Conjurations indicates a character's skill at controlling damage-dealing spells of various types. While some spells are pure Conjurations (e.g. Magic Dart), most damage-dealing spells combine this skill with an elemental school or other skill (e.g. Stone Arrow, Hailstorm).

See Also

  • Conjurer

History

  • 0.28 Added Flame Wave. Bolt of Magma is now only for monsters.
  • 0.25 Removed many Conjurations from player spell lists: Flame Tongue, Throw Flame, Throw Frost, Dazzling Spray, Force Lance, Throw Icicle, Bolt of Draining, Venom Bolt, Bolt of Fire, Bolt of Cold, Poison Arrow, and Glaciate. Also added several new spells: Foxfire, Dazzling Flash, Hailstorm, and Starburst.
  • 0.14 Introduced Glaciate to replace Ice Storm.
  • 0.13 Introduced Searing Ray and boosted Force Lance from level 2 to level 5 with a corresponding increase in power.
  • 0.12 Introduced several new, non-elemental Conjurations.

rawPage:
{{version028}}
'''Conjurations''' indicates a character's skill at controlling damage-dealing spells of various types. While some spells are pure Conjurations (e.g. [[Magic Dart]]), most damage-dealing spells combine this skill with an elemental school or other skill (e.g. [[Stone Arrow]], [[Hailstorm]]).

{{skill aptitudes}}

{{spell table by level|Conjuration}}

==Sources==
{{spell sources|Conjuration|Book of Annihilations,Book of Conjurations,Book of Dangerous Friends,Book of Power,Book of Spectacle,Book of the Spheres}}

==See Also==
*[[Conjurer]]

==History==
*[[0.28]] Added [[Flame Wave]]. [[Bolt of Magma]] is now only for monsters.
*[[0.25]] Removed many Conjurations from player spell lists: [[Flame Tongue]], [[Throw Flame]], [[Throw Frost]], [[Dazzling Spray]], [[Force Lance]], [[Throw Icicle]], [[Bolt of Draining]], [[Venom Bolt]], [[Bolt of Fire]], [[Bolt of Cold]], [[Poison Arrow]], and [[Glaciate]]. Also added several new spells: [[Foxfire]], [[Dazzling Flash]], [[Hailstorm]], and [[Starburst]].
*[[0.14]] Introduced [[Glaciate]] to replace [[Ice Storm]].
*[[0.13]] Introduced [[Searing Ray]] and boosted [[Force Lance]] from level 2 to level 5 with a corresponding increase in power.
*[[0.12]] Introduced several new, non-elemental Conjurations.
